title: Face Elixir
short_description: Hydration + Barrier Support for Melanated Skin
details:
A luminous, restorative emulsion that hydrates, firms, and softens the look of uneven tone — formulated for mature, melanated skin.

NFE Face Elixir is the cornerstone of our Layered Care philosophy. Born from years of research and personal necessity, this sophisticated formula addresses the unique needs of mature, melanated skin: barrier fragility, uneven tone, and persistent dryness.

Every ingredient is chosen with intention — from barrier-strengthening ceramides to tone-supporting actives that work in harmony with your skin's natural resilience.
benefits: Deeply hydrates and strengthens the skin barrier
Supports more even, radiant tone over time
Reduces the appearance of fine lines and crepiness
Strengthens barrier function for improved moisture retention
Non-comedogenic and suitable for sensitive skin
Layers beautifully under sunscreen and makeup
usage:
Morning Ritual:

After cleansing, apply 1–2 pumps to face and neck. Gently press into skin using upward motions. Allow to absorb for 2–3 minutes before applying sunscreen.

Evening Ritual:

After cleansing and any treatment products (as recommended by your dermatologist), apply 1–2 pumps to face and neck. Massage gently until absorbed. The elixir provides lasting hydration and a supple, luminous finish — no additional moisturizer needed.

Pro Tip: For maximum absorption, apply to slightly damp skin or mist with a hydrating toner first.
ingredients_inci:
Key Actives:

  • Niacinamide — Supports barrier function and helps even tone
  • Ceramides — Strengthens the skin barrier and locks in moisture
  • Hyaluronic Acid — Provides multi-level hydration
  • Peptides — Supports skin firmness and elasticity
  • Botanical Extracts — Antioxidant and soothing properties

Full INCI List:

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Hyaluronic Acid, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

texture_scent_experience:
Texture

A weightless, serum-oil hybrid that glides onto skin without heaviness or greasiness. The emulsion formula feels like a second skin — hydrating like a serum, nourishing like an oil, but never leaving a residue.

Scent

No fragrance or perfume is added. Any soft aroma arises naturally from the elixir's pure botanical actives — including trace amounts of Blue Tansy and Helichrysum essential oils, chosen for their skin-soothing and restorative properties rather than scent.

Experience

Each application feels like a quiet moment of renewal. The formula absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling supple, balanced, and ready for the next layer of care. The elixir's warm amber hue reflects the richness of its natural actives — no dyes or colorants. Over time, consistent use reveals smoother texture, improved barrier function, and a more even, luminous tone.
